game.name: Mirror Maker
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The reason we made Mirror Maker is to give the players the freedom to create. Make your own version of Mirror and share it with the world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The reason we made Mirror Maker is to give the players the freedom to create. Make your own version of Mirror and share it with the world.

reviewHighlights.text: Mirror Maker is an unusual entry in the world of adult-themed visual novels because it functions less like a traditional game and more like a creative...
